rows.label: qst650206_msg0001
rows.name: Grampypon Senzo!

rows.label: qst650206_msg0002
rows.name:
Tora not think Grampypon had it
in him! This increase Tora's opinion
of Grampypon by factor of five!

rows.label: qst650206_msg0003
rows.name: Meh-ho-hoo!

rows.label: qst650206_msg0004
rows.name:
Grampypon have many years to
expand scope of reading material!

rows.label: qst650206_msg0005
rows.name:
As I say before, no longer have time
to waste on dreaming small!

rows.label: qst650206_msg0006
rows.name:
Tora underestimate Grampypon...
but now Tora adjust estimation!
Adjust upward!

rows.label: qst650206_msg0007
rows.name: Meh-ho-ho!

rows.label: qst650206_msg0008
rows.name:
Right, so...
How would we make use of this
Hanabuster, then?

rows.label: qst650206_msg0009
rows.name:
Thanks to the data you kindly gathered,
I can operate to the greatest effect
irrespective of my Driver's experience.

rows.label: qst650206_msg0010
rows.name:
In other word...
Hanabuster can become Blade of
Rex, or Blade of Nia. Is no matter!

rows.label: qst650206_msg0011
rows.name: Can Hanabuster be Blade of Tora?

rows.label: qst650206_msg0012
rows.name: Tora already have Hana.

rows.label: qst650206_msg0013
rows.name:
Absolutely correct.
Hana always fight by Masterpon's side.

rows.label: qst650206_msg0014
rows.name: Touching words move heart of Tora...

rows.label: qst650206_msg0015
rows.name:
As long as Tora have Hana,
Tora not need stupid Hanabuster!

rows.label: qst650206_msg0016
rows.name:
Would you like me to crush him for you,
Ma'am?

rows.label: qst650206_msg0017
rows.name: Meh-meh?!

rows.label: qst650206_msg0018
rows.name:
Tora misspoke. Hanabuster is greatest
of inventions. Please do not crush.

rows.label: qst650206_msg0019
rows.name:
Now is time! Hanabuster seem to be
brimming with pep and attitude.
Anyone want to go for test drive?

rows.label: qst650206_msg0020
rows.name: Totally!

rows.label: qst650206_msg0021
rows.name:
Then for test purposes, go to
Superbia and defeat Maxos Arachno.

rows.label: qst650206_msg0022
rows.name: Good choice for first opponent!

rows.label: qst650206_msg0023
rows.name: Hana...

rows.label: qst650206_msg0024
rows.name:
You not yet used to fighting while also
controlling Hana Mk. II, so best to take
things slow at first.

rows.label: qst650206_msg0025
rows.name:
Your fear is absurd and unwarranted,
considering I will be there to support
Ms. Hana.

rows.label: qst650206_msg0026
rows.name: ...Hana feel more confident already.

rows.label: qst650206_msg0027
rows.name:
P-personality matrix appear slightly
outside initial parameters, but learn
by doing seem like best approach!

rows.label: qst650206_msg0028
rows.name: That sound good to Hana!
